author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
## PR Summary

This was originally found where $PSversionTable.PSVersion was broken, but the real problem is whenever a table header spans multiple rows due to limited width, the calculation was incorrect for ensuring
no trailing whitespace.

To do this correctly, we need to calculate the last column that has content and add empty strings for cells that are empty.  Also make sure to trim the trailing whitespace from the last column that has content for
a given row.

Fix https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/6482
